meanings.sent1: I bought a new pair of jordans for basketball practice.
meanings.sent2: Her jordans were stylish and comfortable for running.
meanings.sent3: The jordans made him jump higher than he ever had before.
meanings.sent4: Her jordans were like springs on her feet, propelling her forward effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The bright red jordans stood out on the basketball court.

meanings.definition: A region in the Middle East.

meanings.sent2: Many tourists visit the historical sites in the jordans.
meanings.sent3: The jordans were known for their beautiful landscapes and rich history.
meanings.sent4: The jordans were a tapestry of cultures blending together.
meanings.sent5: The jordans were a land of mystery and wonder.

meanings.sent1: The famous author used the pen name 'J.K. Jordans'.
meanings.sent2: The jordans family reunion was a joyous occasion.
